Vampirtron:
     He took the device away from Rodimus and looked it over. "This should work. Thank Primus."
 airly2000 wrote:Nightlight:

"Thanks Primus and Rodimus, You're all right!!!"Said Nightlight with 
a big smile after that she did a big kiss to Rodimus, she didn't know 
what did Rodimus, but she was sure that rodimus had helped Blackfang, 
at whom she look him like an old brother.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "Well, it wasn't so much the physical damage as what happened up 
> here."  Jackie taps his lupine companion's cranial module.  "I had 
to 
> rewire a few connections in your logic center."  He decides against 
> telling him about the berserker incident for now.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang was startled. He didn't even open the mouth.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Hey! That wasn't me! It was Kenzo's idea I think!
> > 
> > He got up from the operation table and took grab of it a moment 
so 
> he 
> > could recalibrate his balance.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Hey Wheeljack, since I don't remember anything since 
the 
> > battle with the preds, was I that bad?
